arguments.description: A reusable JavaScript API client class with error handling and authentication

examples.name: Upload YAML configuration as text file

arguments.text_content:
version: '3.8'

services:
  web:
    build: .
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:password@db:5432/myapp
    depends_on:
      - db
      - redis
    volumes:
      - ./logs:/app/logs
    restart: unless-stopped

  db:
    image: postgres:15
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_DB=myapp
      - POSTGRES_USER=user
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
      - ./init.sql:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init.sql
    restart: unless-stopped

  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    command: redis-server --appendonly yes
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
    restart: unless-stopped

  nginx:
    image: nginx:alpine
    ports:
      - "80:80"
      - "443:443"
    volumes:
      - ./nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf
      - ./ssl:/etc/nginx/ssl
    depends_on:
      - web
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  postgres_data:
  redis_data:

networks:
  default:
    driver: bridge
arguments.caption: üê≥ Docker Compose configuration for multi-service application

notes.base64_encoding: All base64 content in examples is properly encoded. To create your own:
notes.file_size_limits: Maximum file size is 10MB per file
